hadiths.text: Aishah said; When anyone amongst us (the wives of the Prophet) menstruated, the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) asked her to tie a waist wrapper (over her body) and then husband lay with her, or he (Shu’bah) said:embraced her

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصِيبُ مِنْهَا مَا دُونَ الْجِمَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: A Person Has Relations With Her Other Than Intercourse
